posts.post_content:
I think RDW is slowly including black I heard they're including cards like blightning. If that's true, this is gonna be pretty good with cards like ball lightning and hellspark elemental, since those guys die anyway. It can also act as removal if you're really desperate (say a baneslayer is kicking your ass). And of course if you have enough dragons, the ultimate (which can be used once it hits the field) ends the game.  
  
I think it's better than its current 2.5 rating.

Posted By: Justice1337 (8/20/2011 5:23:03 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Red/green deck with a BoPs and some mana conversion with 4x [Dragonmaster Outcast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dragonmaster Outcast) could work wonders for Sarky here.  
  
Use [Harrow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harrow)s to get lands out there much faster so your Outcasts can start producing 5/5 dragons.  
  
Any time after that, drop StM here for an instant win with his ultimate. Include any number of dragon/direct damage spells to make it easier. Odds are, you've done damage to the opponent at this point so you wouldn't even need to wait until you had 4 tokens out.  
  
Or you could always go with [Conspiracy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conspiracy) and make everything you control into a dragon...
posts.html:
Red/green deck with a BoPs and some mana conversion with 4x Dragonmaster Outcast could work wonders for Sarky here.

Use Harrows to get lands out there much faster so your Outcasts can start producing 5/5 dragons.

Any time after that, drop StM here for an instant win with his ultimate. Include any number of dragon/direct damage spells to make it easier. Odds are, you've done damage to the opponent at this point so you wouldn't even need to wait until you had 4 tokens out.

Or you could always go with Conspiracy and make everything you control into a dragon...

Posted By: MechaKraken (6/14/2012 1:30:12 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
In truth this guy is very good, it's just because he has one small downside people rate him low. Even if you just use his 0 ability, card draw is very good for red/black, and usually you will just draw a land so that's 0 damage to him. His -2 is even better, especially since you can use it on your own guys like [perilous myr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=perilous myr). His ultimate is also good, even if you aren't running a ton of dragons.  
  
tl;dr He is really underrated. I would say having a 5/5 and dealing 5 damage for ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) is good.  
  
Also, I'm surprised nobody mentioned [doubling season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=doubling season).
posts.html:
In truth this guy is very good, it's just because he has one small downside people rate him low. Even if you just use his 0 ability, card draw is very good for red/black, and usually you will just draw a land so that's 0 damage to him. His -2 is even better, especially since you can use it on your own guys like perilous myr. His ultimate is also good, even if you aren't running a ton of dragons.

tl;dr He is really underrated. I would say having a 5/5 and dealing 5 damage for is good.

Also, I'm surprised nobody mentioned doubling season.
